title: How much can you earn from a Spotify podcast? - Quora

response.answer_text: $0.00 You pay that site for the ability to upload and broadcast. So many people are fixated on thinking they can use the web to make BIG MONEY when in fact the web is a very small closed thing for outsiders and is controlled by MEGA cartels and governments. It got even worse after Donald Trump signed the executive order to end NET NEUTRALITY. Now individuals and small groups have little rights on the web and even less access to making actual money.
